item.description:
Some people are on tight budgets such as myself so I found a party as well as a great band I have listed being "WildFire" they play alot of gigs at Maddys in Saugus, any way there will be costumes, prizes $$$ for best and you can listen to a good old fashion live rockin band, Capones is a well established Restuarant and a dance floor that I have eaten and danced at with other groups, plenty of space for dancing, there is also plenty of parking not to worry. Cost is $5.00 see ya there!!!, costumes are optional and bring your friends I love meeting new people.

Cash Prizes: 1st place-200.00 2nd place-100.00 3rd place -50.00
Also must sign up by 9PM to qualify for best costumes. First fifty contestants recieve a door prize.

Capone's lounge offers live bands with a varied mix of dance music every Thursday, Friday and Saturday. There is a $5 cover on Friday and Saturday. We have 2 bars and 2 dance floors. Proper dress is required; casual is fine, but please no hats or sleeveless shirts (men). You must be 21 or older to be in the lounge.

Event Details
Saturday, October 30
Capone's - Halloween Party
9:00 pm
147 Summit St, Peabody, MA

978-977-0520

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Last Minute Posting For Halloween Night Party "WildFire".
